alert.note: Alert for Chemung (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 18 at 3:15PM EDT until April 19 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Chemung county. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Heavy, wet snow could lead to scattered power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could be as high as 1 to 2 inches per hour, with isolated areas approaching 3 inches per hour at times. Snow totals will be highly elevation dependent, with the highest totals in the higher terrain.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
